title: Orchestration of Remediation
extract: Defining Orchestration. ... The definition of orchestration includes the automated arrangement, coordination, and management of computer systems, middleware, and services. Orchestration takes advantage of multiple tasks that are automated in order to automatically execute a larger workflow or process.Dec 22, 2017
